name: "Bounce Blast" Construct 3 Template
description:
Bounce Blast is a physics based puzzle game loosely based on pinball. The goal is to fill up the exit portal by firing energy balls from your ship into it. You can increase the energy level of these balls by creating bouncy platforms you can create and move around the game area. The more platforms energy balls hit, the more energy they will have. Use as few energy balls as possible to close the exit!

Controls : Can be seen in instruction screen. Use touch or left mouse clicks to interact with the objects in the game area.

Features include : 

  • Pinball inspired physics
  • Simple touch and mouse controls
  • Two kinds of 'Bouncer' platform for the ball to bounce off
  • Options to change the difficulty level by changing variables at the main menu
  • Sprites, including some based on Kenney https://kenney.itch.io/ assets, and particle effects
  • Colour changing backgrounds, exits and bouncer sprites
  • Music from 3xBlast https://3xblast.itch.io/ and sound effects

If you like this prototype or are a Construct developer, please consider donating, or purchasing this template to get access to the Construct 3 files.

Any bugs or feedback, please leave a comment or drop me a message, thanks!
